# allowsExternalBinaryDataStorage

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the attribute allows external binary storage.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsExternalBinaryDataStorage: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the attribute allows external binary storage, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the corresponding attribute may be stored in a file external to the persistent store itself.

## Configuring the behavior

- **allowsCloudEncryption**: A Boolean value that determines whether to encrypt the attribute’s value.
- **defaultValue**: The default value of the attribute.
- **preservesValueInHistoryOnDeletion**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the attribute records its value in the persistent history transaction for a managed object’s deletion.
- **valueTransformerName**: The name of the transformer to use for the attribute value.
